column1: bashar-alsadik-02592755,Bashar,Alsadik,Assistant professor in photogrammetry at ITC faculty - University of Twente,,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D4E16AQH3tXNDhDtwzQ/profile-displaybackgroundimage-shrink_350_1400/0/1675761063782?e=1697673600&v=beta&t=dGg8MpWwZlKO2F2AK_8kuxOukezvV5cUEaHC6ehQ2SE,personal,ACoAAAu0jV0BNWzDsxPu_CjTHF2i6mPBnfm6EAI,196382045,,"I like the analytical parts of Geomatics and photogrammetry and trying to apply research and development to the mentioned topics. Especially in the applications related to the AEC industry and built cultural heritage. Furthermore, I am experienced in the topic of adjustment computations and theory of errors and wrote a book in this field.
